entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
